title: Anime Character Vocalizations
description: Immerse yourself in the magical world of anime like never before with our Anime Vocalizations Sound Effects Library.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Immerse yourself in the magical world of anime like never before with our Anime Vocalizations Sound Effects Library, a treasure trove of 1102 precisely created vocalizations brought to life by seven amazing voice actors. This collection is your ticket to creating immersive experiences, boosting your projects, and taking your audience on an aural journey they won't soon forget.


  • 1102 female & male anime vocalizations (from 7 voice actors)
  • 38 minutes of game ready & optimized audio
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format


Versatile and Game-Ready:

These sound effects are optimized for seamless integration into your game, TV, or film projects. Each sound effect is expertly edited and mastered, ensuring it's ready to be used out of the box (RTU-OTB). The memory footprint optimization makes them efficient for any platform or genre, saving you valuable development time.


Includes:

This sound library includes anime vocalizations from 7 voice actors. Each of the seven characters come with the following sound types / categories: Crying, Death, Fighting, Idle, Jumping, Laughing, & Pain. Great for fight scenes, NPC interactions and in-game characters that need emotes.


Effortless Navigation, Instant Creativity:

The library follows the Universal Category System (UCS) labeling for smooth navigation. The files are organized into categories based on male / female, age & effort types. Additionally, Soundminer metadata is embedded with rich keywords to help you quickly find the right sound at the right time.


Royalty-Free Licensing:

Rest assured that all sound effects are royalty-free, meaning you can use them in your projects without worrying about additional fees. The license allows for commercial use, making it perfect for both indie developers and professional sound designers.


Product details:

  • 1102 female & male anime vocalizations (from 7 voice actors)
  • 406.6 MB of voice samples
  • 38 minutes of game ready & optimized audio
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • Universal Category System (UCS) compliant
  • Perfect for Anime, RPG, and RTS
  • 289 Female Adult
  • 133 Female Mixed Age
  • 125 Female Young
  • 119 Female Young Adult
  • 161 Male Adult
  • 149 Male Mature
  • 126 Male Middle Aged
  • Each sound group features sound types for:
  • Crying, Death, Fighting, Idle, Jump, Laughing & Pain
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
